com.github.erchu.beancp

Interface DeclarativeMap<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - source class
    D - destination class

    public interface DeclarativeMap<S,D>
    Defines mapping between source and destination class. Both source and destination classes:
    • Must have default (no argument) public or protected constructor. This requirement is valid even if destination object builder is provided by constructDestinationObjectUsing(java.util.function.Supplier) method.
    • Cannot be final
    • Cannot be inner non-static classes.
    Interface methods must be executed in the following order:
    1. constructDestinationObjectUsing(java.util.function.Supplier) zero or one time
    2. beforeMap(com.github.erchu.beancp.Action) zero or many times
    3. useConvention(com.github.erchu.beancp.MapConvention) zero or one time
    4. bind(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, com.github.erchu.beancp.BindingOption...), bindConstant(java.lang.Object, java.util.function.Consumer, com.github.erchu.beancp.BindingOption...), mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, java.lang.Class, com.github.erchu.beancp.BindingOption[]) and mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, java.util.function.Supplier, java.lang.Class, com.github.erchu.beancp.BindingOption[]) methods zero or many times in any order
    5. afterMap(com.github.erchu.beancp.Action) zero or many times

      • constructDestinationObjectUsing

        DeclarativeMap<S,D> constructDestinationObjectUsing(Supplier<D> destinationObjectBuilder)
        Operation used to build destination object. Must be thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        destinationObjectBuilder - destination object builder, must be thread-safe.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • beforeMap

        DeclarativeMap<S,D> beforeMap(Action action)
        Action to be performed before declared mappings. Must be thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        action - action to be executed after mappings, must be thread-safe.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • beforeMap

        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • useConvention

        DeclarativeMap<S,D> useConvention(MapConvention MapConvention)
        Adds mappings using convention. Convention mappings are performed before other mappings defined by bind(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, com.github.erchu.beancp.BindingOption...) and bindConstant(java.lang.Object, java.util.function.Consumer, com.github.erchu.beancp.BindingOption...).
        Parameters:
        MapConvention - convention to use. Must be thread-safe.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • bind

        <T> DeclarativeMap<S,D> bind(Supplier<T> fromFunction,
                             Consumer<T> toMember,
                             BindingOption<S,D,T>... options)
        Adds calculated member binding to destination member or members. Must be thread-safe.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value data type
        Parameters:
        fromFunction - calculated member function, must be thread-safe.
        toMember - destination class member, must be thread-safe.
        options - additional mapping options
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

        toMemberClass - destination class member type
        options - additional mapping options
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
